title: PhD alumnus Matteo Maggiori wins prestigious Fischer Black Prize
author: Laura Counts
excerpt:
Berkeley Haas PhD alumnus Matteo Maggiori has been awarded the American Finance Association’s 2021 Fischer Black Prize, which honors the top finance scholar under 40.
